name: Castle Cards Clash!
description:
Castle Cards Clash is a matching style card game. To start, you are given a hand of five cards, and your goal is to play every card in your deck faster than your opponent! To play, players must click on a card in their hand that has a matching symbol, color, or number of symbols that matches the central play pile of cards in the center of the play area. When empty handed, just click the deck to draw a new deck! Go as fast as possible to beat the opponent and claim the crown!

Programmer - Zach Schoop

Designer - Matthew Collins

Artist/ Modeler - Jaylen Johnson
